itunes:title: American Unity Radio Podcast (I'm the guest)
title: American Unity Radio Podcast (I'm the guest)
description:
Historical figures like George Washington and Lucius Quinctius Cincinnatus can teach us about humility and virtue in politics and life.   Host Randolph "Wolf" Shipon and I discussed these topics and more on the American Unity Radio podcast, in which Dr. Shipon seeks to bring a divided America closer together.  He talks about putting red, white and blue together to form “purple people.”  Enjoy!


Support the show

This show was created with love on my volunteer time. One small gift you can give me back is to take the time to leave the show a comment and rating on iTunes. You can also support the production costs of this show through buying me a coffee for $3 on buymeacoffee.com/dralexandra

itunes:author: Dr. Randolph "Wolf" Shipon with Dr. Alexandra, Guest
itunes:keywords: George Washington, Cincinnatus, History, Humility, Politics
